inputs.name: driver
inputs.description: Sets the builder driver to be used

inputs.name: driver-opts
inputs.description: List of additional driver-specific options. (eg. image=moby/buildkit:master)

inputs.name: install
inputs.description: Sets up docker build command as an alias to docker buildx build

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the builder. If not specified, one will be generated or if it already exists, it will be used instead of creating a new one.

inputs.name: endpoint
inputs.description: Optional address for docker socket or context from `docker context ls`

inputs.name: platforms
inputs.description: Fixed platforms for current node. If not empty, values take priority over the detected ones

inputs.name: append
inputs.description: Append additional nodes to the builder

inputs.name: keep-state
inputs.description: Keep BuildKit state on cleanup. This is only useful on persistent self-hosted runners.

inputs.name: cache-binary
inputs.description: Cache buildx binary to GitHub Actions cache backend

inputs.name: cleanup
inputs.description: Cleanup temp files and remove builder at the end of a job

outputs.name: endpoint
outputs.description: Builder node endpoint (deprecated, use nodes output instead)

outputs.name: status
outputs.description: Builder node status (deprecated, use nodes output instead)

outputs.name: flags
outputs.description: Builder node flags (deprecated, use nodes output instead)
